pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau meets with President Park Geun-Hye of South Korea | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau met today with President Park Geun-Hye on the margins of the APEC Summit in the Philippines.

The two leaders discussed means of deepening the dynamic and mutually beneficial relationship that exists between their countries. They recognized the importance of the Canada â€“ Korea strategic partnership, which has been solidified by the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement.

They also discussed other pressing bilateral and global issues, including international and regional security, and climate change.
